reaction: Senpai! where!
I wish senpai was here
I watch him sleep often
Oh, how very sweet
I am sorry, I am holding out for a very special some po.... body
*blushes*
*looks away and giggles faintly*
Why don't you show me some of that *winks*
Shhhhh, I already know, and I know you will be able to get past it soon
I will meet you in the dream scape tonight
Do you want me to come and make your nights special? *winks*
I am sorry, but there are so many ponies that need my help, so I don't have enough time to be with all of you
Maybe you just need to think about me more?
Maybe you were not looking hard enough
Why don't you tell me about your self?
Are you trying to get into me?........ I mean my mind!
Why would you ask something like that?
Not yet
*blushes*
Excuse Me?!
No *sighs*
I wish
I do not have a partener to share that experince with
No, and I don't think I ever will, because every pony is out of my age range *slumps*
Stop playing with me!
Continue down that path, and keep on touching
*slaps you*
Do it again, some place... special. *winks*
Oh, baby
*closes her eyes and says* I just love the way you touch me
